amendment.description: To clarify the availability of funds for the National Guard for National Guard and Reserve equipment.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4827 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4827 proposed by Senator Bond. (consideration: CR S8682-8685, S8691; text: CR S8684) To clarify the availability of funds for the National Guard for National Guard and Reserve equipment.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4827 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4827 proposed by Senator Bond.
